description:
Despite Boss, Howdy and Stan`s anger, the Ham-Hams decide to build a fun park under Panda`s leadership. Meanwhile, Laura`s family goes to the amusement park, but the car machinery breaks down. Kana`s family stops to help and Laura and Kana spend the day at the amusement park. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこ活躍[かつやく]! パンダくん
